ai-sn25:1.1.2_0: “Mendicants, the eye is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:1.1.3_0: The ear is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:1.1.4_0: The nose is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:1.1.6_0: The body is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:1.1.7_0: The mind is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:1.1.8_0: Someone who has faith and confidence in these principles is called a follower by faith. They’ve arrived at inevitability regarding the right path, they’ve arrived at the level of the good person, and they’ve transcended the level of the bad person.
ai-sn25:1.1.9_0: They can’t do any deed which would make them be reborn in hell, the animal realm, or the ghost realm.
ai-sn25:1.1.10_0: They can’t die without realizing the fruit of stream-entry.
ai-sn25:1.2.1_0: Someone who accepts these things is called ‘giveness’.
ai-sn25:1.2.1_1: ‘Dhammadinnā, who was followers, having arrived at the level of the good person, and he transcended the level of the bad person.
ai-sn25:1.2.2_0: They can’t do any deed which would make them be reborn in hell, the animal realm, or the ghost realm.
ai-sn25:1.2.3_0: They can’t die without realizing the fruit of stream-entry.’
ai-sn25:1.2.4_0: Someone who understands and sees these principles is called
ai-sn25:1.2.4_1: stream-enterers, not liable to be reborn in the underworld, bound for awakening?”
ai-sn25:2.1.2_0: “Mendicants, sights are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:2.1.3_0: The ears are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:2.1.4_0: When smells are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:2.1.5_0: the tastes are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:2.1.6_0: and touches are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:2.1.7_0: Thoughts are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:2.1.8_0: Someone who has faith and confidence in these principles is called a follower by faith. They’ve arrived at inevitability regarding the right path, they’ve arrived at the level of the good person, and they’ve transcended the level of the bad person.
ai-sn25:2.1.9_0: They can’t do any deed which would make them be reborn in hell, the animal realm, or the ghost realm.
ai-sn25:2.1.10_0: They can’t die without realizing the fruit of stream-entry.
ai-sn25:2.2.1_0: Someone who accepts these things is called ‘giveness’.
ai-sn25:2.2.1_1: ‘Dhammadinnā, who was followers, having arrived at the level of the good person, and he transcended the level of the bad person.
ai-sn25:2.2.2_0: They can’t do any deed which would make them be reborn in hell, the animal realm, or the ghost realm.
ai-sn25:2.2.3_0: They can’t die without realizing the fruit of stream-entry.’
ai-sn25:2.2.4_0: Someone who understands and sees these principles is called
ai-sn25:2.2.5_0: stream-enterers, not liable to be reborn in the underworld, bound for awakening?”
ai-sn25:3.1.2_0: “Mendicants, eye consciousness is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:3.1.7_0: Mind consciousness is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:3.1.8_0: Someone who has faith and confidence in these principles is called a follower by faith. ...”
ai-sn25:4.1.2_0: “Mendicants, eye contact is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:4.1.7_0: and mind contact are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:4.1.8_0: Someone who believes in these principles is called a follower by faith. ...”
ai-sn25:5.1.2_0: “Mendicants, feeling born of eye contact is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:5.1.7_0: and feeling born of mind contact are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:5.1.8_0: Someone who believes in these principles is called a follower by faith. ...”
ai-sn25:6.1.2_0: “Mendicants, perception of sights is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:6.1.7_0: perception of thoughts are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:6.1.8_0: Someone who believes in these principles is called a follower by faith. ...”
ai-sn25:6.1.10_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
ai-sn25:7.1.2_0: “Mendicants, intention regarding sights is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:7.1.7_0: intention regarding thoughts are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:7.1.8_0: Someone who believes in these principles is called a follower by faith. ...”
ai-sn25:8.1.2_0: “Mendicants, craving for sights is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:8.1.7_0: and craving for thoughts are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:8.1.8_0: Someone who believes in these principles is called a follower by faith. ...”
ai-sn25:9.1.2_0: “Mendicants, the earth element is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:9.1.7_0: and consciousness are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:9.1.8_0: Someone who believes in these principles is called a follower by faith. ...”
ai-sn25:10.1.2_0: “Mendicants, form is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:10.1.3_0: Feeling is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:10.1.5_0: volitions are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:10.1.6_0: and consciousness are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-sn25:10.1.7_0: Someone who has faith and confidence in these principles is called a follower by faith. They’ve arrived at inevitability regarding the right path, they’ve arrived at the level of the good person, and they’ve transcended the level of the bad person.
ai-sn25:10.1.8_0: They can’t do any deed which would make them be reborn in hell, the animal realm, or the ghost realm.
ai-sn25:10.1.9_0: They can’t die without realizing the fruit of stream-entry.
ai-sn25:10.2.1_0: Someone who accepts these things is called ‘giveness’.
ai-sn25:10.2.1_1: ‘Dhammadinnā, who was followers, having arrived at the level of the good person, and he transcended the level of the bad person.
ai-sn25:10.2.2_0: They can’t do any deed which would make them be reborn in hell, the animal realm, or the ghost realm.
ai-sn25:10.2.3_0: They can’t die without realizing the fruit of stream-entry.’
ai-sn25:10.2.4_0: Someone who understands and sees these principles is called
ai-sn25:10.2.5_0: stream-enterers, not liable to be reborn in the underworld, bound for awakening?”
ai-sn25:10.2.7_0: The first sub-chapter on eyes is finished.
ai-sn25:10.3.4_0: the aggregates are the ten elements:
ai-sn25:10.3.5_0: The Linked Discourses on comprehension are complete.
